title: 'Pardon me for being born into a nation of racists' T-shirt
brief_description: “The slogan on the T-shirt was from a poster I had made during the 1971 South African Springbok rugby tour of Australia, which drew massive anti-apartheid demonstarations in Australia.” - Gary Foley
